result.title: Square Root Decomposition and Friends
result.content:
Resources

  1. Video Lecture by Sergey Kulik — https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VGq6w9TlJBY
  2. Another brilliant document covering many categories of problems that can be solved with square root decomposition - http://acm.math.spbu.ru/~sk1/mm/lections/mipt2016-sqrt/mipt-2016-burunduk1-sqrt.en.pdf
  3. Mo's Algorithm by Anudeep Nekkanti — https://blog.anudeep2011.com/mos-algorithm/
  4. Mo's Algorithm on Trees — http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/43230

Problems

Square Root Decomposition Problems

  1. http://codeforces.com/contest/425/problem/D
  2. http://www.spoj.com/problems/RECTANGL/

Hint for 1. and 2. — http://www.cs.uu.nl/research/techreps/repo/CS-1989/1989-10.pdf

  1. https://www.hackerrank.com/contests/w37/challenges/dynamic-line-intersection
  2. All problems given here — http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/23005
  3. All problems given here — https://www.commonlounge.com/discussion/6205343265434ffc88723f70fec0b796
